title: RuntimeError: CUDA error: unknown error
body:
win10+cuda10.0+pytorch1.1.0，some code is modified by https://github.com/lufficc/SSD/commit/81ec279cfe4e0dd90a1e2714bd637e273d74aa77

FOR train，RuntimeError: CUDA error: unknown error

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train_ssd.py", line 142, in <module>
    main()
  File "train_ssd.py", line 133, in main
    model = train(cfg, args)
  File "train_ssd.py", line 34, in train
    model.to(device)
  File "D:\Anaconda3\envs\SSD\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 386, in to
    return self._apply(convert)
  File "D:\Anaconda3\envs\SSD\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 193, in _apply
    module._apply(fn)
  File "D:\Anaconda3\envs\SSD\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 193, in _apply
    module._apply(fn)
  File "D:\Anaconda3\envs\SSD\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 199, in _apply
    param.data = fn(param.data)
  File "D:\Anaconda3\envs\SSD\lib\site-packages\torch\nn\modules\module.py", line 384, in convert
    return t.to(device, dtype if t.is_floating_point() else None, non_blocking)
  File "D:\Anaconda3\envs\SSD\lib\site-packages\torch\cuda\__init__.py", line 163, in _lazy_init
    torch._C._cuda_init()
RuntimeError: CUDA error: unknown error
